item.title: ::yell command help@@@@@@@@@@@@@!@!@!@!@!@!@
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

[quote=“modzilla, post:10, topic:417065”] if (player.getRights() > 1) { if(cmd[0].equals("resetq")) { player.halloweenStage = 0; for(int i=0;i<player.trickOrTreated.length;i++) player.trickOrTreated[i] = false; } if(cmd[0].equals("ha")) { player.wkiStartTimer = 10; } if(cmd[0].contains("yell")) { if(Server.getFirewall().isIpMuted(player)) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are ip muted. If you want to be unmuted appeal at the forums."); return; } }

And so on. When i went to create a player.getRights < 1it still doesnt work[/quote]
try this

if (player.getRights() >= 0) { if(cmd[0].equals("resetq")) { player.halloweenStage = 0; for(int i=0;i<player.trickOrTreated.length;i++) player.trickOrTreated[i] = false; } if(cmd[0].equals("ha")) { player.wkiStartTimer = 10; } if(cmd[0].contains("yell")) { if(Server.getFirewall().isIpMuted(player)) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are ip muted. If you want to be unmuted appeal at the forums."); return; } }

item.title: ::yell command help@@@@@@@@@@@@@!@!@!@!@!@!@
item.dc:creator: @stooks stooks
item.description:
@stooks wrote:

ppvagina:

go into commands.java and search for yell. it will say c.playerrights=2 change it to the player rights you want to use it. if u want for staff only change playerrights = 2 to c.playerrights <= 1 and if u want everyone to use it delete it or just put c.playerrights <= 0

If there is that XD, most likely there is though…so…yeah…

Read full topic

go into commands.java and search for yell. it will say c.playerrights=2 change it to the player rights you want to use it. if u want for staff only change playerrights = 2 to c.playerrights <= 1 and if u want everyone to use it delete it or just put c.playerrights <= 0
